subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The former Wildcats quarterback Kain Colter joined executives of the newly formed College Athletes Players Association and the United Steel Workers in order to be granted “a seat at the table.”
snippet: The former Wildcats quarterback Kain Colter joined executives of the newly formed College Athletes Players Association and the United Steel Workers in order to be granted “a seat at the table.”
